|brand = ipTIME |model = A2000UA |submodelappend = <!-- yes for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 08/15/2013 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/IpTIME_A2000UA |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = AC1200 |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = USB |if_bus_version = 3.0 |ifconnector = Female Micro-B |formfactor = corded (modular) adapter
|vendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |device_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = 64:E5:99
|chip1 = Realtek;RTL8812AU; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = RP-SMA |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |802.11ac = 867 |802.11n = 300/300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->

|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== The release is specified as being in June 2013.
Per '''EFM''''s driver set, this device uses RTL8812AU. :The default RTL8812AU USB ID (0bda:8812) is likely used..
==Links of Interest== [http://max1013.tistory.com/entry/ipTIME-A2000UA-Review-1 Review on '''max1013.tistory.com'''] (dated 2013-07-25) :The KCC regulatory ID of the device is '''KCC-CRM-EFM-IPTIMEA2000UA'''. :The product code on the box is 8809228971756.
{{lowercase title}} [[Category:English Documentation]]
